snippet: President Obama used his clemency power to fix an obvious error in a man’s prison sentence, but only after the Justice Department tried to block the man’s claim.
abstract: Editorial contends Pres Obama was right to use his clemency power to help Ceasar Huerta Cantu, who was wrongly sentenced to three and half extra years in federal prison due to a typo on his pre-sentencing report; criticizes Justice Dept for fighting Cantu's request to have his sentence corrected in the first place, citing resistance as absurd.
lead_paragraph: President Obama used his clemency power to fix an obvious error in a man’s prison sentence, but only after the Justice Department tried to block the man’s claim.
